## Built With

* [Dropwizard](http://www.dropwizard.io/1.0.2/docs/) - The web framework used

* [Maven](https://maven.apache.org/) - Dependency Management

* [ROME](https://rometools.github.io/rome/) - Used to generate RSS Feeds
